document_data.name: Thamalon's Own
document_data.creator: [[Thamalon Uskevren]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/273/Rogues Gallery: The Heroes of Stormweather|67}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thamalon's Own''' was a [[pear]] [[wine]] created by [[Thamalon Uskevren]], of the noble [[Uskevren]] family of [[Selgaunt]], [[Sembia]], in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Thamalon's Own was the color of straw.
document_data.History: By the mid-14{{th}} century DR, Thamalon's love for winemaking paid off. He created [[Storm Ruby]], [[Usk Fine Old]], and Thamalon's Own wines.
